attributes.action: Stop all censorship on the e-petitions site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a old libertarian (well we were at one point) society the majority of  people are sensible enough to acknowledge sensible opinion and, be trusted to reach their own conclusions.

It should not be up to any person or groups of people to decide what is acceptable as a petition, especially when extremely popular petitions are seemingly ignored or, not taken full account of in deciding the direction of Government policy.

As Thomas Jefferson stated "rightful liberty is unobstructed action, drawn around us by the equal rights of others. I do not add within 'the limits of the law', because law is often but the tyrants will and, always so when it violates the rights of the individual"

So please Prime Minister take us back to the libertarian heritage of this country and stop all censorship, starting with this website.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
